description_md: Natural primary key in YYMMKK format (2-digit year + 2-digit month + ship_key)
unique location (longitude, latitude) and time along cruise
Sequential integer primary key (sorted by cruise_key and orderocc)
Foreign key to cruise table (propagated from cruise via cruise_uuid)
Point geometry (WGS84 EPSG:4326) created from longitude and latitude
Foreign key to grid table (assigned via spatial intersection)
Sequential integer primary key (sorted by site_id and time_start)
Foreign key to site table (propagated from site via site_uuid)
Sequential integer primary key (sorted by tow_id and side)
Foreign key to tow table (propagated from tow via tow_uuid)
Consolidated tidy table of ichthyoplankton observations from egg, egg_stage, larva, larva_stage, and larva_size source tables
Sequential integer primary key (sorted by net_id, species_id, life_stage, measurement_type, measurement_value)
Type of measurement: 'stage', 'size', or NULL for total count
Numeric value of measurement (stage number or length in mm)
Unified vocabulary lookup table for egg stages, larva stages, and tow types
Numeric code for the lookup value
Character code for the lookup value (e.g. YOLK, PREF)
Human-readable description of the lookup value
CalCOFI survey grid polygons with standard and historical station patterns
Natural primary key (e.g. st60-ln80 or st60-ln80_hist for historical)
Alongshore component of CalCOFI coordinate system
Offshore component of CalCOFI coordinate system
Polygon geometry (WGS84 EPSG:4326) of grid cell
Point geometry (WGS84 EPSG:4326) of grid cell centroid
Line segments between consecutive sites along a cruise track
Sequential integer primary key (sorted by time_beg)
